Package com.fssa.pin.dao

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.pin.dao.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
This class provides methods to interact with the database related to User operations.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser(User user) throws DAOException
      Creates a new user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing user information.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the user creation is successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user) throws SQLException, DAOException
      Updates an existing user's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing updated user information.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the update is successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an issue with the SQL operation.
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(String email) throws DAOException
      Deletes a user from the database based on their email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the deletion is successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • isEmailAlreadyRegistered

      public boolean isEmailAlreadyRegistered(String email) throws DAOException
      Checks if an email is already registered in the system.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to be checked.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the email is already registered, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

      public String getUserPasswordFromDb()
      Gets the user's password from the database.

      The user's password from the database.

      public void setUserPasswordFromDb(String userPasswordFromDb)
      Sets the user's password in the database.
      Parameters:
      userPasswordFromDb - The user's password to be set in the database.

    • loginUser

      public boolean loginUser(User user) throws DAOException
      Tries to log in a user by checking their credentials in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user's login details.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the login is successful, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.
